name: Satan's puzzle 666
description:
Satan's Puzzle 666 is a puzzle game where you have to match the
pieces to obtain the seal of evil spirits and behold their
divine image



  • meet 12 angels who were expelled from heaven alongside lucifer
  • Relax with the soundtrack that is calm, profane and dark
  • Play with mouse and buttons
  • Black, white and hellish design
  • Fun facts about evil spirits and their abilities
